titleStmt.title: A Copy of the Association agreed upon by the Honourable House of Commons on Monday the 24th of February 1695/6
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Includes list of members of the House of Commons who did not sign the "Association," a declaration of support for William III against the followers of James II.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
